summary: The Summer Olympics is a big international sports event held every four years. It started in 1896 in Greece and has grown a lot since then. Now, athletes from over 200 countries compete in hundreds of events. The games give out gold, silver, and bronze medals for the top three places. The Summer Olympics are so popular they inspired the Winter Olympics. Only a few countries have been in every Summer Olympics, and the United States has won the most medals overall.
title: Summer Olympic Games
